Our Services

Construction Management

Marsella Properties provides full construction services, including but not limited to: new construction, leasehold improvements, construction management, project management, owner representation, and design-build. Marsella extends these services to the tenants and building owners they represent as well as the general business community. Our extensive experience is delivered by a team of highly skilled project managers and construction managers.
